div.div: at Grove City, Pa. | Robert E Thorn Field

tr.td: Grove City wins toss, defers. W&J receives, defends south goal.
Ryan Stewart kickoff 60 yards to the WJC5, Max Creighan return 27 yards to the WJC32, out-of-bounds (Jeff Croll;Josh McElrone).
Pete Coughlin pass incomplete to Max Creighan.
Ryan Ruffing rush for 2 yards to the WJC34 (Bran. Berringer;Jason Skyrm).
